Key Match Events: Benches and bullpens cleared in the bottom of the 6th inning due to a hard tag by Anthony Volpe on Maikel Garcia
Miscellaneous Highlights: The crowd booed Jazz Chisholm Jr. for his previous comments about the Royals getting lucky in Game 2
Others: The Yankees had a 3-0 lead before the incident, and the Royals were able to score one run
